attributes.action: Create a Memorial to the servicemen of the allied forces who served at RAF Selsey ALG
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To create a memorial to the servicemen who paid the ultimate sacrifice in the defence of this Country and supported the D-Day landings from Royal Air force Selsey. The site still contains the remains of an original hanger, but is sadly neglected. A small plaque erected by Sussex County Council is all that marks the spot.
